Text.val: -- Author: Bujakowski Grzegorz
17.02.2014 SH SCR18704 Added BCM038.PO.INVESTMENTGROUPC/BCM038.PO.PO.PENDINGADVANCESC
21.01.2014 SH SCR18655 Added BCM038.PO.CVCREDITMARGIN/BCM038.PO.CVCREDITMARGINGROUP
17.10.2012 GB SCR17495 Added call BCM038 to check if finance is allowed
05.10.2012 GB SCR17592 Added the CLNT212_FCI = 0 to the selection
30.01.2012 GB SCR17083 Changed calculation for the V.ADVANCEH in the Split advance over the clients
29.01.2012 GB SCR16653 Changed condition for the Build totals of one legal clien
20.09.2011 SH SCR16727 Added calc of v.GUARANTEESH
03.08.2011 GB SCR16653 Changed condition for the Build totals of one legal clien
03.05.2011 SH SCR16387 Changed Heller in Admin currency and repl.GB002 by GB902
28.01.2010 GB SCR15619 Changed value of update the CLNA_SETTLEMENTOFCOSTS
16.11.2009 SH SCR15054 Fixed problems with deletion of temp table which is used
to split the advance over the clients (has to be deleted per main legal client
and not per main legal administration)
23.10.2009 SH SCR15002 Fixed SQL problems in tasks "SUM(INVA)' and
08.09.2009 SH SCR14633 Mult bug fixes
Perform this part only if GSET_YESNO (302) = Y
-- Reset variabls per lagal client
-- If for any of the selected CLIENT rows on legal client level there
already a CLIENT_ADVANC then continue with the next distinct legal group
-- If V.TOTALADVANCEH =< 0 then continue with the next distinct legal group,
nothing has to be transfered
-- Start to create advances
-- The total investment of the group should not exceed the maximum amount

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/CLNT where CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 and CLNT404_AUTOMATICPRIORITY > 0 and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2 and exists ( select * from :1/CLNA where CLNA_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CLNA_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED = 'N') for fetch only

Text.val: -- only if CLNT404_ADVANCECALCULATION = 1,2,5,6,8,9,10
-- only if CLNT614_INTERESTUPFRONT = Y or GSBU_YESNO (2027) = Y
-- only if CLNT614_INTERESTUPFRONT = Y
-- calc AVAILABILITYH, INVESTMENTH
-- for every selected CLIENT row a row in a temptable (memory)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(ACCC_MUTAINVESTMENT) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(ACCC_MUTASETTLEMENT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/ACCC where ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':2' and ACCC_MUTTYPE > 95 and ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :3 and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :4 for fetch only

select cast(sum(INVA_ACTASPECIAL) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(INVA_ACTAFACTORING) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVA where INVA_CURRENCY = ':2' and exists ( select * from :1/INVO where INVO_ADMNO = :3 and INVO_CLNTNO = :4 and INVO_AACTUALI < 0 and INVO_PAYMENTCODE <> 0 and INVO_NO = INVA_NO) for fetch only
select cast(sum(CONC_ACTINVACONCC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CONC where CONC_DEBC_NO = 0 and CONC_ADMNO = :2 and CONC_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only

Text.val: IF V.TOTALADVANCEH > V.MAXH - V.TOTALINVESTMENTH then set
V.TOTALADVANCEH = V.MAXH - V.TOTALINVESTMENTH

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP join :1/CLNT on CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 where CDEP_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CDEP_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CDEP_TYPE in (1,6,7) for fetch only

Text.val: @For every selected row perform the tests until V.TOTALADVANCEH =< 0
If v.ADVANCEH > AVAILABILITYH then set V.ADVANCEH = AVAILABILITYH
If V.ADVANCEH < V.MINH then obtain the next client in the client group
-- Call BCM038 to check if finance is allowed
-- Deduction of transfer costs
-- End of one client
-- CLNA_REQAMOUNT
